import React from 'react' import {Button, Col, Row , ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutStep from '../components/CheckoutStep' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate) const {loading, success , error} = orderCreate const {shippingAddress, cartItems} = cart return ( <>

Shipping

Address : {shippingAddress.address}, {shippingAddress.city}, {shippingAddress.postalcode}, {shippingAddress.country}.

Payment Method

{cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.paymentMethod}

 ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
